TopicTitle: Is there a setting I can change to predict more than three orbits ahead?

Articles.Content:
The title pretty much says it all. Is there a setting that can be changed to show more than three orbits? I want to plan out a couple slingshots and I'm not confident enough to do them one at a time.

Edited June 9, 2015 by Randazzo
Increase the conic patch limit either with precise node mod or by changing the CONIC_PATCH_LIMIT in your settings.cfg. A higher number of patches means plotting your orbit through more SOI changes.
I bet about 1k people have looked at this, and said love YES!
The conic patch limit is in your settings now. You don't need mods or config file editing.
